job.command:
stardev setup 64bits
set tpc_eff = `basename &tpc_eff_file;` set tof_eff = `basename &tof_eff_file;`
set parameterList0 = `basename &inputParameter0;` set parameterList1 = `basename &inputParameter1;` set parameterList2 = `basename &inputParameter2;` set parameterList3 = `basename &inputParameter3;` set parameterList4 = `basename &inputParameter4;` set parameterList5 = `basename &inputParameter5;` set parameterList6 = `basename &inputParameter6;`
root -b -l -q RunEvents.C\(\"$FILELIST\",\"$parameterList0\",\"$INPUTFILE0\",\"$tpc_eff\",\"$tof_eff\"\) root -b -l -q RunEvents.C\(\"$FILELIST\",\"$parameterList1\",\"$INPUTFILE0\",\"$tpc_eff\",\"$tof_eff\"\) root -b -l -q RunEvents.C\(\"$FILELIST\",\"$parameterList2\",\"$INPUTFILE0\",\"$tpc_eff\",\"$tof_eff\"\) root -b -l -q RunEvents.C\(\"$FILELIST\",\"$parameterList3\",\"$INPUTFILE0\",\"$tpc_eff\",\"$tof_eff\"\) root -b -l -q RunEvents.C\(\"$FILELIST\",\"$parameterList4\",\"$INPUTFILE0\",\"$tpc_eff\",\"$tof_eff\"\) root -b -l -q RunEvents.C\(\"$FILELIST\",\"$parameterList5\",\"$INPUTFILE0\",\"$tpc_eff\",\"$tof_eff\"\) root -b -l -q RunEvents.C\(\"$FILELIST\",\"$parameterList6\",\"$INPUTFILE0\",\"$tpc_eff\",\"$tof_eff\"\)
